item.title: Live updates: Iran retaliates against U.S. forces in Iraq and Qatar

item.title: U.S. intel found Iran did not move nuclear material from Fordo ahead of attack, Sen. Mullin says
item.description: President Trump said air strikes on Fordo and two other facilities at Natanz and Isfahan, "completely obliterated" Iran's major nuclear enrichment sit...

item.title: Iran attacks U.S. military base in Qatar with missiles

item.title: Trump slams Russia's Medvedev for claiming countries will give Iran nuclear warheads
item.description: Trump's nuclear saber-rattling could suggest he feels emboldened after ordering the bomb attacks against Iranian nuclear sites.

item.title: Senators will stay in D.C. until Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' passes, Thune says
item.description: Majority Leader John Thune's comments are a sign of the growing pressure he faces to get Republican hold-outs on board.
